AVERY CHEN
San Francisco Bay Area, CA, US | B2B SaaS (PLG) | Platforms: Web, Mobile

SUMMARY
Product manager with 8 years in B2B SaaS (PLG) serving B2B. Focus on measurable outcomes, clear writing, and tight experiment loops.

• Built funnel taxonomy (GA4/Segment) and self-serve dashboards for PMM/CS.

cover_letter:
Dear Hiring Team,

I'm a product manager with 8 years in B2B SaaS (PLG), focused on translating customer friction into outcomes. My background spans B2B across Web, Mobile. I work with clear goals, rapid iteration, and transparent readouts.

In my current role as Senior Product Manager at FlowHub, I Led onboarding overhaul; +22% W2 activation and +11% trial→paid through 30+ experiments. Previously at AcmeCRM, I Owned notifications platform; reduced monthly churn by 3.5% via usage-triggered comms.

I partner closely with engineering, design, and GTM to frame problems, sequence bets, and de‑risk with experiments. I write to create alignment and make impact legible through dashboards and regular readouts.

I’m excited about teams that value product craftsmanship and analytical rigor: improving onboarding and reliability, elevating marketplace efficiency, and compounding wins into durable growth.

Thank you for your time — I’m happy to share example specs, experiment readouts, or dashboards.

Regards,
Avery Chen
